CHAT.comment: ARNOLD SCHWARZENEGGER, GOVERNOR OFCALIFORNIA, ET AL., Petitioners v. MARCIANO PLATA, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:10 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CARTER G. PHILLIPS ON BEHALF OF THE APPELLANTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DONALD SPECTER ON BEHALF OF THE APPELLEES
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF CARTER G. PHILLIPS ON BEHALF OF THE APPELLANTS
(Whereupon, at 12:31 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
